name: onelogin
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing onelogin cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`onelogin` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-onelogin).

provider.description:
The provider type for the onelogin package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering App resources.
Input properties used for looking up and filtering AppRoleAttachment resources.
Input properties used for looking up and filtering AppRule resources.
Input properties used for looking up and filtering OidcApp resources.
Input properties used for looking up and filtering Privileges resources.
Input properties used for looking up and filtering Role resources.
Input properties used for looking up and filtering SamlApp resources.
Input properties used for looking up and filtering SmartHook resources.
Input properties used for looking up and filtering User resources.
Input properties used for looking up and filtering UserMapping resources.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getUser.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getUser.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getUsers.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getUsers.
